resources.string:
IBM® App Launch for IBM Cloud enables App Owners & App Developers to launch features to mobile apps at speed and measure their impact by controlling the targeted audience. The app owner can work with app developers to 

• Toggle Features 
• Customize app properties & behavior 
• Test multiple variants of the feature 
• Define Key Performance Indicators (KPI) 
• Make real time roll out/roll back decisions based on the KPI
